醁字的基本解释

醁
lù
美酒：“多酤新丰醁”。

醁字的汉语字典释义

[①]［lù］
［《廣韻》力玉切，入燭，來。］
美酒。

醁字的康熙字典解释

【酉集下】【酉字部】　醁； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页1284第05
【廣韻】力玉切【集韻】【韻會】龍玉切，?音錄。【廣韻】美酒。【集韻】?醁，酒名。【抱朴子·嘉遁卷】寒泉旨於?醁。【正字通】《通雅》曰：酃淥，因作醽醁、醽綠。《廣韻》訓醽爲淥酒，則以醁爲淸酒矣。衡陽縣有酃湖，今之酃縣也，土人取其水以釀。晉武平吳薦醽酒於大廟。《荆州記》：淥水出豫章康樂縣，其閒烏程鄉有井，官取水爲酒，與湘東酃酒年常獻之。或曰酃湖水綠，故名酃綠，加酉爲酃醁。　又【集韻】【正韻】?盧谷切，音祿。義同。

考證：〔荆州記，淥水出豫章康樂縣，其閒烏程縣有井，官取水爲酒〕　謹照原文烏程縣改烏程鄉。

醁字的起名意思

美酒。

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[You Ji 2] [You Zi Department] 　醁; Kangxi Strokes: 15; Page Number: Page 1284 No. 05
[Guang Yun] Li Yuqie [Jiyun] [Yunhui] Long Yuqie,? Sound Record. [Guangyun] Fine wine. [Ji Yun]? Xi, the name of the wine. [Baopuzi·Jia Dun Juan] Hanquan aims at? [Zhengzitong] "Tongya" says: Zhilu, because of its tangy, tangy green. "Guangyun" preached 醁 wine as lujiu, then used 醁渌酒矣. There is Zhihu in Hengyang County, and in today's Zhixian County, the natives take the water to brew. Jin Wuping Wu Jianli wine in the temple. "Jingzhou Ji": Lushui leaves Kangle County, Yuzhang, and there is a well in Wucheng Township in its leisure time. The official takes water as wine, and it is always offered with Xiangdong Zhijiu every year. Or it is said that the lake water is green, hence the name 酃绿, and the addition of 酉 is 酃醁.　[Jiyun] [Zhengyun]? Lu Guqie, Yinlu. The same meaning. Textual research: [Jingzhou Records, Lushui flows out of Yuzhang Kangle County, and there are wells in Wucheng County, and the official takes water for wine] 　 I would like to change the original Wucheng County to Wucheng Township.
